name: cwrc-public-entity-dialogs
description: Dialogs for the CWRC-Writer that lookup people, places, organizations, and publications in public authority files.
author: “James <“jc.chartrand@gmail.com”>

scripts.build: mkdirp dist && browserify src/index.js --s cwrcdialogs > dist/cwrcdialogs.js
scripts.test: mkdirp coverage && npm run test:electron && npm run generate-coverage
scripts.test:watch: mkdirp test/build && watchify test/test.js --debug -o test/build/test.js -t [ browserify-istanbul ]
scripts.test:browser: browserify -t browserify-istanbul test/test.js | browser-run  -p 2222 --static .  | node test/extract-coverage.js | faucet
scripts.test:electron: browserify -t browserify-istanbul test/test.js | browser-run --static . | node test/extract-coverage.js | faucet
scripts.test:chrome: browserify -t browserify-istanbul test/test.js | browser-run --static . -b chrome | node test/extract-coverage.js | faucet

hooks.pre-commit: npm run test && npm run check-coverage
